"Everybody knew what was at stake," Allen Iverson said. It's easy for players to say it's just another game. But everybody knows it wasn't just another game. It was a game that both teams felt they had to have. The win moved Denver( 48-31) a full game ahead of the Warriors in the race for eighth place in the West with only three games remaining. SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.
